name: Cowboys in Space
description:
Controls WASDMoveMouseClick Menu Buttons

You are a cowboy in space. Avoid the planets trying to hit you and stay alive as long as you can! The trusty space steads will help you along the way by making you invulnerable to the planets.

This is a project submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 that I made in about 8 hours or so.

If you find any bugs or want to brag about your high score please feel free to comment and tell me about them. Also please don't forget to rate my game as well as check out some of the other games in the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2!
